sourcesContent: #navbarMain{ background: #CECECE; display: block; height: 120px; } .navbarList li > a { display: block; text-decoration: none; } .navbarul{ padding-top: 8px; /* margin-left: 10%; */ } ul.navbarul li{ display: inline-block; } .navbarList{ display: block; margin-left: 2px; list-style: none; text-align: center; padding: 7px 10px; border: 1px solid #ECECEC; background: #ECECEC; cursor: pointer; height: 100px; min-width: 150px; } .navbarList:hover{ border: 1px solid #9D9D9D; } .image{ width: 40px; margin-top: 5px; }
